Sure, here are some ideas for romantic activities that long-distance couples can do together:

1. Cook and eat a meal together over video chat: Agree on a recipe, do your grocery shopping separately, and then cook the same meal together while on a video call. Share a bottle of wine or a dessert, and enjoy a romantic dinner together.

2. Have a virtual movie night: Agree on a movie to watch together, start it at the same time, and chat during or after the movie to share your thoughts and reactions. Use a streaming service like Netflix Party or Zoom to watch the movie together.

3. Play online games together: There are many online games that couples can play together, such as online chess, trivia games, or virtual puzzle games. You can also play multiplayer video games, which can be lots of fun.

4. Take a virtual tour: Many museums, galleries, and tourist attractions now offer virtual tours that you can take together. Pick a place that you've both always wanted to visit, and spend an afternoon exploring the sights and learning together.

5. Have a surprise date night: Plan a special surprise date night for your partner, which could involve sending them flowers or their favorite food, or a care package filled with romantic items. You could also set up a surprise video call or online game, or send them a love letter in the mail.

Remember, the most important thing is to show your partner that you care and that you're committed to your relationship. Whatever you do, make sure it comes from the heart and reflects your love for each other.
